ogTitle: congressman says he will object to electoral college votes for the sake of his grandkids - smarther news
ogDescription: congressman brian babin (r-tx) explains why this objection matters and responds to those who say his actions are corrosive to america – he also shares what he discussed recently with president trump.
summary: Congressman Brian Babin (R-TX) explains why this objection matters and responds to those who say his actions are “corrosive” to America – He also shares what he discussed recently with President Trump.
